name: ManyWho Box Service
description: A plugin that enables integration of Box into ManyWho Flows

secure.privateKeyLocation.description: The path to the private key used by the box app in server to server requests

secure.privateKeyPassword.description: The password used for the private key

oauth2.contentApi.clientId.description: The Client Id of the ManyWho Application in box

oauth2.developerEdition.clientId.description: The Client Id of the ManyWho (server-to-server) Application in box

oauth2.developerEdition.clientSecret.description: The Client Secret of the ManyWho (server-to-server) Application in box

assignment.flowId.description: Flow Id used when a webhook is created from box

assignment.flowVersionId.description: Flow Version Id used when a webhook is created from box

assignment.tenantId.description: Tenant Id used when a webhook is created from box

redis.url.description: Redis url to be used by this service

webhook.signature.primary.key.description: Key used to check if the webhooks request really come from box

webhook.signature.secondary.key.description: Secondary Key used to check if the webhooks request really come from box
